snippet: Nigeria has advised its citizens against any non-urgent travel to the United States until Washington clarifies its immigration policy, after several incidents in which people with valid visas were denied entry, a presidential aide said on Monday....

headline.main: Nigeria Seeks U.S. Immigration Clarity, Advises Against Non-Urgent Travel
headline.print_headline: Nigeria Seeks U.S. Immigration Clarity, Advises Against Non-Urgent Travel

lead_paragraph: Nigeria has advised its citizens against any non-urgent travel to the United States until Washington clarifies its immigration policy, after several incidents in which people with valid visas were denied entry, a presidential aide said on Monday.
